SCTX - Script Source:
Scn fbmwTRkarrodfightstopScript

short doOnce
short combatOnce
short DuelMiss

begin onHit player
	if ( GetStage fbmwTRChampion >= 70 )
		if ( GetStage fbmwTRChampion < 80 )
			if ( fbmwTRChampion.karrodFightStart == 3 )
            ;when a guard is hit during duel, increment duel counter
				Set DuelMiss to ( DuelMiss + 1 )
				if ( DuelMiss <= 5 )
                ;if duel counter 5 or less, stop combat
					StopCombat Player
					SetAV Aggression 0
					ModDisposition Player 10
				endif
				if ( DuelMiss > 5 )
					if ( doOnce == 1 )
                    ;if duel counter > 5, force combat
						StartCombat Player
						SetAV Aggression 100
						set doOnce to -2
					endif
				endif
			endif
		endif
	endif
End

	
begin gamemode
	if ( fbmwTRChampion.kingHit == 1 )
		if ( combatOnce == 0 )
            ;if king is hit, force combat, set through script on King
			ModDisposition Player -100
			StartCombat Player
			fbmwKarrodREF.StartCombat Player
			Set combatOnce to 1
		endif	
		return
	endif

	if ( fbmwTRChampion.KarrodBeaten > 0 )
		if ( doOnce == 1 )
            ;if duel is over, make guards normal again
			SetAV Aggression 5
			ModDisposition fbmwKarrodREF 90
			ModDisposition Player 90
			stopcombat
			set doOnce to -1
		endif
		return
	endif

	if ( GetStage fbmwTRChampion == 70 )
		if ( fbmwTRChampion.karrodfightstart == 3 )
			StopCombat
            ;pacify guards during duel
			if ( doOnce == 0 )
				SetIgnoreFriendlyHits 1
				setAV Aggression 0
				ModDisposition Player 90
				ModDisposition fbmwKarrodREF 90
				set doOnce to 1
			endif
		endif
	endif
end
;<CSEBlock>
;<CSECaretPos> 1579 </CSECaretPos>
;</CSEBlock>
